meaningMnemonic: You’ll need a <kanji>heavy</kanji> dose to <kanji>tranquilize</kanji> yourself enough to be a <vocabulary>leader</vocabulary>. It can pretty stressful to be a leader so most of them are sedated. Tranquilize yourself too and you'll be just like them!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
